text: Sam Bennett may refer to: * Sam Bennett (baseball) (1884–1969), Negro league baseball player * Sam Bennett (cyclist) (born 1990), Irish cyclist * Sam Bennett (ice hockey) (born 1996), Canadian ice hockey player * Sam Bennett (Pennsylvania politician), American politician from Pennsylvania * Sam Bennett (Passions), a character on the American soap opera Passions * Sam Bennett (Private Practice), a character on the TV series Private Practice * Samuel Bennett (1815–1878), journalist and newspaper owner in colonial Australia
title: Sam Bennett
